column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I had a business meeting in San Fran and I lived in San Jose .
#id=2
#text=Being that they were not that far of a distance I decided to take the train to it instead of flying .
#id=3
#text=I went online and bought my train ticket and printed it out the night before and packed my things .
#id=4
#text=I then got to the train station and parked .
#id=5
#text=I went up to my train , train number four , and gave my ticket to the conductor and boarded the train .
#id=6
#text=I was able to put my suitcase in the overhead bin and sat down in my seat which to my surprise was quite roomy .
#id=7
#text=Very different from the cramped seats on an airplane .
#id=8
#text=They even had plugs in the seats and Wi-Fi .
#id=9
#text=I decided to pull out my laptop and check emails and get some work done during my hour and a half train ride .
#text=We arrived at our destination and I got off the train , grabbed my things and caught a taxi to my hotel .
